name: Merge Car Billionaire
description:
This is a story about dreams. If you have a dream car or if you know what your dream life is, you must play this game.

Come check out if your dream car is in the game. If not, suggest on our Facebook and get voted for the next car to be released. If your car gets voted, you get the FREE VIP status for a month!

Major game plays include:

- Constantly acquire new cars in as many as 7 ways presented in the game.

- Race your cars to generate revenue for your business.

- Participate in world tournaments, win big money, and get your name on the leaderboard.

- Become a VIP and show off your fancy racing tracks.

- Connect with friends, gift each other, and stay in touch.

Ready, Set, Merge, Race!
